The new Sora app

Turn your ideas into videos with hyperreal motion and sound.

Rolling out now.

From words to worlds

Start with a prompt or upload an image to create videos with unprecedented realism in any style: cinematic, animated, photorealistic, or surreal.

Create a funny video|
a retro futuristic world|

Youre the star

Cast yourself and your friends in videos as characters. You control how or when your character is used.

Learn more about Characters

Remix everything

Take someone elses creation and put your spin on it. Swap characters, change the vibe, add new scenes, or extend the story.

One wide shot of @daniel and @minnia working together in a drab cubicle office except Daniel only responds with meows|

Cue the sound

Music, sound effects, and dialogue are automatically included in videos to make every scene complete.
